title: JS Overview
description: `app.js` in `/src/js` is used as the main bundle to compile by gulp (using webpack). See `modules` folder for module sample.

sections.title: CommonJS
description: CommonJS provides the `require()` function which allows importing of a module into the current scope. It also provides the `module` object which allows exports from the current scope.

sections.title: Docs
description: This documentation is an `angular.js` application. The application is compiled as a separate bundle from the `docs.js` file into `/docs/assets/js`.

sections.title: .jshintrc
description: The default `.jshintrc` file sets rules for writing JS. Text editors with a linter will use the `.jshintrc` file to visualize errors.
